purpose: To provide a management and control platform for PostgreSQL databases, enhancing operational efficiency and database performance monitoring.
principle: Built on Python, leveraging PostgreSQL for database operations and management tasks.
reusability: Modular design with API endpoints for database management tasks, easily integrable into existing PostgreSQL setups.
limitations: Primarily focused on PostgreSQL; may not support other database systems without adaptation.
name: pg-mcp-server
highlight: High-performance PostgreSQL management and control server
